property.name: hashing.max.freq
property.description: Max frequency permitted for each feature within each document

property.name: hashing.option.num
property.description: Options: (1)collect features (2) featureVectors (3) featureWeightVectors (5) bag of hashed words

property.name: hashing.binary.weights
property.description: ignore features frequencies, they all occured once

property.name: hashing.lonely.features
property.description: hash features appearing in one document.

property.name: hashing.md5.hash
property.description: md5 hash features instead of sequential

property.name: hashing.df.cut
property.description: fraction cut off of popular features after sorting by popularity in HashMapper.java

property.name: hashing.num.reducers
property.description: default number of reducers for hasing vectors
